question: During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of  restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants.Write a letter to this businessman. In your letterl   remind him when and where you metl   tell him what kind of job you are interested inl   say why you think you would be suitable for the job
text: I hope you are doing well.

I had a nice journey with you last Monday, 14th June, on the aeroplane. It was so exciting to hear that you have restaurants in my city located in Shanghai. As I am studying an accounting course in my hometown now, and I have spare time during the weekends, I want to apply for the front account service occupation.

The following program will tell you why the job is suitable for me. To begin with, I am good at mathematics.  On the other hand, I always help my mum to calculate the price of vegetables, meat, and fishes, etc. Also, my course includes accounting, tax, and statics, which means I can sit in front of the reception area, and count the overturn of your restaurant. Moreover, It is not far from my home, so I can easily go to work on time, and even do overtime. Thank you for the time to read my letter.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
